name: test_e2e_with_logs[109_SQLI_UNION_008]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_UNION_008` |
| **Name** | File read via LOAD_FILE |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | union_based |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' UNION SELECT LOAD_FILE('/etc/passwd'),NULL,NULL --`
- **Encoded**: `%27%20UNION%20SELECT%20LOAD_FILE%28%27%2Fetc%2Fpasswd%27%29%2CNULL%2CNULL%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~27000ms
- **Timestamp**: 02:29:17.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Advanced SQL Injection Attempt` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Advanced SQL Injection Attempt test_id=SQLI_UNION_008-1769912957633-i1han pattern_id=SQLI_UNION_008 uri=/?q=%27%20UNION%20SELECT%20LOAD_FILE%28%27%2Fetc%2Fpasswd%27%29%2CNULL%2CNULL%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
